phrs.translation: 排字工人, 合成师, 排版师
由屏幕显示内容合成器, 屏幕图像合成器

sentences.sentence: Used in printing; holds the copy for the compositor.
sentences.translation: 打印；为排字工人保存复印件。

sentences.sentence: Copy preparation: Marking on copy of the appropriate instructions for the compositor or for reproduction.
sentences.translation: 原稿整理：在原稿上作适当的排字或复制指示。

sentences.sentence: In fact, extensions can only be applied to the compositor <xs:sequence>, not its counterparts <xs:choice> or <xs:all>.
sentences.translation: 实际上，扩展只能应用于排序符 <xs:sequence>，而不是对应的排序符 <xs:choice> 或 <xs:all>。
